author: clsmith70
body: When you run the command and attempt to retrieve the *BiosSerialNumber*, it always comes back empty because the property in the returned object is misspelled.  The name it returns is **BiosSeralNumber**.

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: Which command are you running that exhibits this behaviour, exactly @clsmith70? 🙂

comments.author: RichardSiddaway
comments.body:
Windows PowerShell v5.1 reports the property as BiosSeralNumber

PowerShell v6.2.2 and v7.0 preview 2 both report the property as BiosSerialNumber

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
The issue was fixed in PowerShell Core.
Windows PowerShell is not in the repo. Please report using Windows Feedback tool or UserVoice site.

title: BiosSeralNumber should be BiosSerialNumber
